mapper.select: select * from neicun order by price
select * from neicun where name like concat('%',#{name},'%') order by price
select * from neicun where price <150 order by price
select * from neicun where price >=150 and price <300 order by price
select * from neicun where price >=300 and price <500 order by price
select * from neicun where price >=500 order by price
select * from neicun where lei =#{lei} order by price
select * from neicun where tao like concat('%',#{tao},'%') order by price
select * from neicun where zhu >=4000 order by price
select * from neicun where zhu =#{zhu} order by price
select * from neicun where zhu <=2400 order by price
